title: 1.8 Spigot创造模式下无法放置方块、使用怪物蛋、丢弃物品
txt_content:
如题！Spigot端，MC1.8
创造模式下放置方块、使用怪物蛋、丢弃物品会导致后台疯狂报错

报错文件语段：
丢弃物品时的报错

[Netty Server IO #3/ERROR]: [BookandQuillFix] Unhandled exception occured in onPacketReceiving(PacketEvent) for BookandQuillFix
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
        at java.util.ArrayList.elementData(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_65]
        at java.util.ArrayList.get(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_65]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.Container.getSlot(Container.java:109) ~[Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R3.inventory.CraftInventoryView.getItem(CraftInventoryView.java:65) ~[Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.github.windmourn.bookbugfix.Protocol$1.onPacketReceiving(Protocol.java:40) ~[BookandQuillFix.jar:?]
        at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.SortedPacketListenerList.invokeReceivingListener(SortedPacketListenerList.java:114) [ProtocolLib.jar:3.6.5-b222]
        at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.SortedPacketListenerList.invokePacketRecieving(SortedPacketListenerList.java:67) [ProtocolLib.jar:3.6.5-b222]

        at com.comphenix.protocol.injector.PacketFilterManager.invokePacketRecieving(PacketFilterManager.java:606) [ProtocolLib.jar:3.6.5-b222]
        at com.comphenix.protocol.compat.netty.independent.NettyProtocolInjector.packetReceived(NettyProtocolInjector.java:332) [ProtocolLib.jar:3.6.5-b222]
        at com.comphenix.protocol.compat.netty.independent.NettyProtocolInjector.onPacketReceiving(NettyProtocolInjector.java:297) [ProtocolLib.jar:3.6.5-b222]
        at com.comphenix.protocol.compat.netty.independent.NettyChannelInjector.decode(NettyChannelInjector.java:546) [ProtocolLib.jar:3.6.5-b222]
        at io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder.callDecode(ByteToMessageDecoder.java:249) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder.channelRead(ByteToMessageDecoder.java:149) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:333) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.fireChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:319) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder.channelRead(ByteToMessageDecoder.java:163) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:333) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.fireChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:319) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at com.comphenix.protocol.compat.netty.independent.NettyChannelInjector$4.channelRead(NettyChannelInjector.java:278) [ProtocolLib.jar:3.6.5-b222]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:333) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.fireChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:319) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder.channelRead(ByteToMessageDecoder.java:163) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:333) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.fireChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:319) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.handler.timeout.ReadTimeoutHandler.channelRead(ReadTimeoutHandler.java:150) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]

        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeysOptimized(NioEventLoop.java:468) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeys(NioEventLoop.java:382) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.run(NioEventLoop.java:354) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.SingleThreadEventExecutor$2.run(SingleThreadEventExecutor.java:116) [Spigot.jar:git-PaperSpigot-060c59e-2642f9b]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_65]
[22:31:49] [Netty Server IO #3/ERROR]: Parameters: 
  net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.PacketPlayInSetCreativeSlot@35a782a7[
    slot=-1
    b=1xtile.stone@0
  ]

复制代码

replies.author: 酷车手BB弹
replies.txt_content:
BookandQuillFix
这款插件出了问题，把他删掉即可

酷车手BB弹 发表于 2016-7-17 00:52
BookandQuillFix
这款插件出了问题，把他删掉即可
在昨晚发帖之后五分钟就自己仔细看了一下报错，已经找到是这个插件在搞鬼了，已经删除
不过非常感谢你的回答
